tasks.title: Setup Project Repository and Environment
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository with the required structure, dependencies, and environment configuration for API keys management.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Verify all project directories are created correctly
2. Ensure environment variables are loaded properly
3. Test environment validation function with missing variables
4. Verify package dependencies install correctly
5. Run linting to ensure code style compliance

tasks.title: Implement Conversation Analysis Engine
tasks.description: Build the core analysis engine that processes raw conversation text to extract key topics, structure, planning elements, and user preferences.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Unit tests for each extraction function with sample conversations
2. Integration test with the OpenAI API using mock responses
3. Test with the seed conversation from the PRD to verify extraction accuracy
4. Validate output structure against expected schema
5. Performance testing to ensure processing completes within acceptable time (<30 seconds)
6. Error handling tests for malformed inputs and API failures

tasks.title: Develop Template Structure Mapper
tasks.description: Create a module that maps conversation analysis results to Notion template components and structures.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Unit tests for each mapping function
2. Test with various analysis results to ensure correct mapping
3. Validate generated template specifications against expected structures
4. Test edge cases (missing preferences, minimal conversation data)
5. Verify that all required components from the PRD are included in the output
6. Test with the seed conversation to ensure it generates the expected template structure

tasks.title: Implement Notion API Integration
tasks.description: Build the integration with the Notion API to create pages, databases, and views based on the template specification.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Unit tests for each Notion API operation
2. Mock Notion API responses for testing
3. Integration tests with a test Notion workspace
4. Verify database creation with correct properties
5. Test relationship setup between databases
6. Validate view configurations (Kanban, Calendar, etc.)
7. Test error handling for API rate limits and failures
8. Verify shareable link generation and permissions

tasks.title: Develop Aesthetic Customization Module
tasks.description: Create a module that detects and applies aesthetic preferences from the conversation to the Notion template.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Unit tests for style detection with various keyword inputs
2. Test mapping of keywords to themes
3. Verify color scheme application to template elements
4. Test icon and emoji assignment
5. Validate custom override functionality
6. Integration test with Notion API to ensure styles are applied correctly
7. Visual inspection of generated templates for aesthetic consistency

tasks.title: Build Template Generation Orchestrator
tasks.description: Create the main orchestration module that coordinates the conversation analysis, template mapping, and Notion API integration.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Integration tests for the full orchestration flow
2. Test with various conversation inputs
3. Verify error handling with simulated failures
4. Test performance with timing measurements
5. Validate output structure and correctness
6. End-to-end test with the seed conversation from the PRD
7. Test with edge cases (very short conversations, very long conversations)
8. Verify logging and progress tracking

tasks.title: Create API Interface
tasks.description: Develop the API interface that allows users to submit conversations and receive generated Notion templates.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Unit tests for API endpoint handlers
2. Test request validation with valid and invalid inputs
3. Test rate limiting functionality
4. Integration tests with mock template generation
5. Load testing to ensure API can handle expected traffic
6. Security testing for authentication and authorization
7. Test error responses and status codes
8. End-to-end API tests with actual template generation

tasks.title: Implement Comprehensive Testing and Documentation
tasks.description: Create thorough testing suite and comprehensive documentation for the application.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Verify test coverage across all modules (aim for >80%)
2. Validate documentation completeness and accuracy
3. Test CI/CD pipeline functionality
4. Conduct user testing with documentation to ensure clarity
5. Verify example templates work as expected
6. Test troubleshooting guide against common failure scenarios
7. Peer review of documentation and tests
